Class ProjectView

java.lang.Object
views.ProjectView
public class ProjectView extends Object
View class responsible for displaying project-related functionalities. It provides methods for displaying project details, creating enquiries, and managing officer registration status for projects.

    • showProjectMenu

      public static void showProjectMenu(Applicant applicant, List<Project> projects)
      Displays the project menu for an applicant, allowing them to view project details or create an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant interacting with the menu
      projects - The list of available projects for the applicant

    • displayProjectList

      public static void displayProjectList(List<Project> projects)
      Displays a list of available projects to the user.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of available projects to be displayed

      public static void displayProjectDetailsOfficerView(Project project)
      Displays detailed information about a project from an officer's perspective.
      Parameters:

    • displayProjectDetailsManagerView

      public static void displayProjectDetailsManagerView(Project project)
      Displays detailed information about a specific project in the Manager view. This method prints the project name, location, manager details, application period, available flat types, and their corresponding unit counts and prices.
      Parameters:
      project - The project which details are to be displayed.

    • displayOfficerRegistrations

      public static void displayOfficerRegistrations(List<Project> projects, List<Registration> officerRegistrations, Officer officer)
      Displays officer registration status for projects handled by the officer.
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to be displayed
      officerRegistrations - The list of officer registrations to be checked
      officer - The officer whose registration details are being displayed
